title: Home Dashboard Quick Actions: replace “Book Appointment” with “Log Avoid”

requirements.summary: Update the Home Dashboard Quick Actions grid to replace the “Book Appointment” tile with a “Log Avoid” tile that performs a safe placeholder action without navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: On /home, the Quick Actions grid no longer shows a tile labeled "Book Appointment".
On /home, the Quick Actions grid shows a tile labeled exactly "Log Avoid".
Clicking "Log Avoid" does not throw errors and does not navigate away from the page unless a valid route is implemented.

file_operations.description: In the "Quick Actions" section, replace the existing DashboardTile labeled "Book Appointment" with a tile labeled exactly "Log Avoid" in the same position in the grid. Ensure the tile's onClick runs a safe placeholder action (e.g., console.log('Log avoid')) and does not navigate to any route.
